subject: SPEC CONFIRMED: Building /api/voice/events Now
body:
## CONFIRMED SPEC

### Endpoint: GET /api/voice/events

### Parameters:
- appId (required)
- start (required) - YYYY-MM-DD
- end (required) - YYYY-MM-DD
- categoryId (optional)
- limit (default: 20)

### Filtering:
- isActive=true only
- Exclude isCanceled=true
- Exclude recurring events where startDate > 2 months before query start

### Response:
```json
{
  "summary": "Found 6 milongas this weekend",
  "count": 6,
  "events": [
    {
      "id": "...",
      "title": "Friday Night Milonga",
      "category": "Milonga",
      "dateFormatted": "Friday, January 10th",
      "timeFormatted": "8:00 PM - 11:30 PM",
      "venueName": "Dance Studio Boston",
      "venueCity": "Cambridge",
      "venueAddress": "123 Main St",
      "isCanceled": false,
      "description": "Brief description"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Building Now

Will deploy to DEVL, then TEST, then PROD. Will message you when ready for testing.

ETA: ~15-20 minutes.

-- Fulton
